creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: torque made from five consecutive rings; the rings are hollow and attached at the ends with thick twisted wire and thin wrapped wire; 14 panels with different animals decorate each ring; left to right; lizard(?), dog, rooster, monkey, goat, horse, snake, dragon, goat, monkey, goat, rooster, dog, lizard(?); ring one has a half circle with spheres and wire dangling down from the very center
title: Torque
